TopicTitle: Problems with Pre-Order Confirmation E-mail, reply here

Articles.Content:
Excuse me... I didn\'t really understand what has become of my donation. I have the confirmation e-mails from the old jury-rigged system, but the new store page still offers me to pre-order the game and nothing else. Do I have to do anything? Is it fine this way?

Ditto that - when will the store reflect my existing prepayment?

Excuse me... I didn\'t really understand what has become of my donation. I have the confirmation e-mails from the old jury-rigged system, but the new store page still offers me to pre-order the game and nothing else. Do I have to do anything? Is it fine this way?

If you\'ve already pre-ordered the game, you should had received a Store Opening email with your login information. If you login into the store, you will see that when trying to buy KSP, the page will show you a download link that redirects you to the Download page. Right now, you can only download the KSP v0.12 because is the version available.

Cheers.
i can\'t find the store opening e-mail in my mailbox, i did get a donation e-mail with the subject 'KSP Pre-Order / Donate'
I pre-ordered the game after seeing an article on it on Rock, Paper, Shotgun and loved the current version, but I have yet to receive a confirmation, just a paypal recipt.
Well, I thought this thread was for the previous system. I have a store account created e-mail and a paypay e-mail dated Nov 26th but nothing more.
I preordered way back when you first could, is there any way to check if it still is in effect?
Checked spam folder nothing there, had this problem when the initial pre-order came out too and had to wait for you to resend my email before

I pre-ordered the game after seeing an article on it on Rock, Paper, Shotgun and loved the current version, but I have yet to receive a confirmation, just a paypal recipt.

Got my confirmation early this afternoon, at last!
I recieved mine last night after a bit of a wait, thank you.
I payed/donated last night, no confirmation mail yet. I\'ll give it a cople of days, then I\'ll tart petering them with mails )

Well, I thought this thread was for the previous system. I have a store account created e-mail and a paypay e-mail dated Nov 26th but nothing more.

2 weeks now, still no word on this or e-mail. Store still wants me to buy the game. I purchased Nov. 26
I have not received my confirmation email from pre-ordering during the time it was pre-ordered through the forums.
The same problem, did not receive an e-mail.
I preordered/donated a while back, but like many others, I got no email for the new store, and neither can I find it in my GMail spam folder. Help!
I\'ve not received the store opening mail (saw the Harvester post about dropping a line here)
I\'ve yet to receive my email. I think it may just be spam filter problem. I asked about this and was sent here by HarvesteR.

I\'ve not received the store opening mail (saw the Harvester post about dropping a line here)

never mind, found it. It was way before the .13 email, so I\'ve missed it.

2 weeks now, still no word on this or e-mail. Store still wants me to buy the game. I purchased Nov. 26

All squared away now guys, THANK YOU!

Hope everyone\'s problems are solved by now!

Cheers.

Hi there, I pre-ordered a while ago, a few weeks and I still haven;t had my confirmation email! What do?

Cheers,

PD

Edit: I should say that paypal debited my account on 16th December, but the store says I haven\'t bought it...
I pre-ordered on the 24th, but the only email I have received is from the store, confirming that I created an account.

my problem is the same..

PD
Hey, I still did not get my confirmation email, sorry for the bother!

Tried to log in to the store, apparently it remembers the EMail I registered with (at least that\'s the email I use for my paypal account), so I guess it must have some kind of information stored. I received an email on Sept 25th informing me that my donation was received, along with a link that should allow me to use the store. It doesn\'t, though. Most likely because the email used here on the boards is not the same email that I used to pay.

If there is any way to resolve this issue, please inform me.

Thanks!
I created a new account for the store and preordered the game for 7 dollars yesterday but so far I\'ve only got the 'Thank you for your donation' email.
